item.description: The BSA Emerging Professionals Network is planning a quarterly film series in cohorts with Aliza Shapiro of Truth Serum Productions, www.truthserum.org. First up: Luckey (www.luckeythefilm.com), a documentary on Tom Luckey, a recently paralyzed architect determined to finish his work on the Boston Children's Museum with the help of his son, Spencer. Join us on Thursday, October 15 at 7:30 pm for the screening at Brattle Theatre in Harvard Square and a post-movie talk with architects from Cambridge Seven Associates. Check back at www.architects.org/epnet for all the deets later this month, when you can also buy tickets at www.brattlefilm.org. We hope to see you there!
item.name: Luckey Screening at Brattle Theatre
